forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. South wind 2 to 9 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Drizzle after 8pm. Mostly cloudy. Low around 52, with temperatures rising to around 54 overnight. South wind 7 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the morning shows promise with a mostly sunny disposition, the city bathed in gentle light as temperatures hover in the inviting realm of the upper 50s. The south wind stirs lazily, offering a soft caress against the skin, encouraging an air of casual exploration. However, as the hours wear on, a shift looms on the horizon; clouds will gradually blanket the sky, and by evening, the city will embrace a drizzle, heralding a change that invites a cozy retreat indoors.

The air remains crisp, with the fog conspicuously retreating for now, revealing the iconic silhouette of the Golden Gate Bridge against a clear backdrop. Yet, as dusk approaches, the marine layer will creep back, unfurling like a familiar blanket, misting the edges of the Bay and softening the contours of the cityscape. Given this transition, a sensible attire might include layers—perhaps a light jacket to fend off the coolness of the late afternoon and an umbrella for the evening drizzle. 

For those seeking an escape into the afternoon, a leisurely stroll to the waterfront could reveal delightful scenery and invigorating views. A visit to a local café might offer a warm nook to sip something comforting as the day drifts into evening. With nature’s subtle shifts in character, one can savor the peaceful cadence of San Francisco’s unique charm today.
